name: Tidytopia
description:
Tidytopia is a Twin Stick Shooter where you play as Lily, a little girl who needs to clean her room so her Dad will let her get a pet rabbit. Clean your way through 4 levels filled with dust piles and dust bunnies, then vanquish the dreaded dust bunny queen. Will Lily be able to prove to her Dad that she's responsible enough for the pet? Find out in Tidytopia!

Controls:

  • WASD to Move
  • Mouse to aim and LMB to shoot, or Arrow Keys to both aim and shoot.
  • Space to Sprint
  • P to pause game

Game prototype made for Game Studio 1 at Red River College.

Created by:

Derek Baert (D_Symmetry) - Programmer

Sujal Naroia - Programmer

Annie Wiebe (twitter.com/fearless_cloud_, fearlesscloud.artstation.com) - Artist

Jyotsna Singla - Artist
